originalText.text: Manufacture dealership couldn’t find the noise and this guys found out and replace the part with Manufactured part since then I bring all my cars to them Mr Tulio and Arturo are the legends there are no more mechanics like them.

text.text: Manufacture dealership couldn’t find the noise and this guys found out and replace the part with Manufactured part since then I bring all my cars to them Mr Tulio and Arturo are the legends there are no more mechanics like them.

originalText.text: Tulio is so knowledgeable about all vehicles. I've been going to him for 13 years and he never cheats me always does quality work.

text.text: Tulio is so knowledgeable about all vehicles. I've been going to him for 13 years and he never cheats me always does quality work.

originalText.text: Honest. Fair pricing. Trustworthy. A GREAT SOUL and exceptional mechanic. This is THE auto repair shop to come to if you want the absolute best. Promise!

text.text: Honest. Fair pricing. Trustworthy. A GREAT SOUL and exceptional mechanic. This is THE auto repair shop to come to if you want the absolute best. Promise!

originalText.text: Had an absolutely pleasant experience with these guys. My car was barely starting but I was able to get to their location. Was over quoted at the BP on 119th and 1st but these guys gave me a more tgan fair price and went above and beyond. I hope you pick them when you need auto repair and have just as GREAT an experience as i did. Best wishes!

originalText.text: Was charged $300 for a motor mount and spark plugs. Motor mount was fixed and we assumed the spark plugs were, too. Days later, the ignition coil was messing up, and he told us it needed to be fixed. We decided to go to a different mechanic for s second opinion. When we went, he said that the coil wouldn’t do any good because the spark plugs needed to be changed. We told him the previous mechanic charged us to have them fixed, and when we looked, all of the spark plugs were old and worn. Nothing was new. I can’t believe this.
